summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving under an overpass in an urban area. The road is clear, and there are no immediate obstacles or pedestrians. The vehicle is approaching a curve to the left.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed while approaching a left curve. The driver is likely preparing to navigate the curve safely.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Left side: A silver car, approximately 5 meters away, parked and not posing any immediate threat.

characters: Driver of a black sedan, driver of a white sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a road with moderate traffic. A black sedan on the right side suddenly accelerates and merges into the lane ahead of the self-driving vehicle, causing a potential cut-in situation. The white sedan ahead maintains a consistent speed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while observing the black sedans sudden acceleration and lane merging behavior. The vehicles speed remains consistent to avoid collision with the merging black sedan.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black sedan, approximately 5 meters away, accelerating and merging into the lane ahead, causing a potential cut-in situation. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining a consistent speed.
